overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Protecting your family's privacy is our priority. This document describes what data we collect, how and why we use it, and your rights and management options. KIKO is designed with 'privacy by design' principles: we minimize data collection and primarily process sensitive information locally on the device.

acceptance.title: Your Acceptance of This Policy
acceptance.content: By using the KIKO device or app, you agree to this Privacy Policy. You can always adjust privacy settings in the app and manage permissions.

collection.title: What Personal Data We Collect
collection.content: We collect minimal necessary information: family member profiles, content preferences, and technical data for device operation. Sensitive data (camera video, audio) is processed locally for interactivity and may be transferred to the cloud only with explicit consent.

sharing.title: Information Sharing with Third Parties
sharing.content: We do not sell your data. Sharing with service partners is only for providing functions (content updates, backup storage) and occurs via encrypted channels. All providers must adhere to our security standards.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: Data is used to personalize interaction (remembering preferences), improve functions (model training), debugging, and security. Aggregated anonymous data may be used to improve products.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.content: You can view, correct, and delete personal data, restrict processing, and request data export. Some data related to security and logs may be retained as required by law.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain data only as long as necessary to provide services. Local media files and recordings can be deleted anytime from device settings. Some technical logs may be archived for diagnostics.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: KIKO uses modern encryption, isolated on-device processing (Edge), and verified cloud solutions for backups. We regularly conduct security audits and update software.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: KIKO is designed for families: parental controls and child modes are enabled by default. We do not collect targeted personalized advertising for children or share children's data without parental consent.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this policy. In case of significant changes, you will be notified in the app. Continued use of KIKO after notification constitutes consent.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us.

general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.content: These Terms govern the use of KIKO devices and services. By using KIKO, you agree to these terms and commit to using the device lawfully and according to rules.

service.title: 2. Service Usage
service.content: KIKO provides interactive communication, projection, video calls, and educational content. Features may be updated. Some options may require registration.

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: Users are responsible for correct device operation, account security, and access data. Parents/guardians are responsible for children's use of KIKO.

privacy.title: 4. Privacy
privacy.content: Personal data processing is in accordance with KIKO's Privacy Policy.

eligibility.title: 2. Age and Eligibility
eligibility.content: KIKO can be used by individuals over 16, with parental consent for those under 16 (regional differences may apply). Access to some features is age-restricted.

account.title: 3. Account Creation and Security
account.content: An account may be required for certain features. You must keep credentials secure and report unauthorized access immediately.

wallet.title: 4. Device Services
wallet.content: KIKO provides storage for user profiles, settings, and content. KIKO is not a financial platform; all content purchases are via secure payment gateways.

transactions.title: 5. Purchases and Payment
transactions.content: In-app and content purchases are final unless stated otherwise. All financial transactions are processed by certified providers.

prohibited.title: 6. Prohibited Use
prohibited.content: Prohibited uses include illegal activities, violating others' rights, spreading malware or harmful content, promoting violence or discrimination.

intellectual.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All rights to KIKO software, design, and content belong to our company or licensors. Users receive a limited license to use.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We are not liable for indirect damages, data loss, or damages from improper device use. Our obligations are limited to the extent permitted by law.

termination.title: 9. Termination of Use
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate access for terms violations. You can also close your account anytime.

law.title: 10. Governing Law
law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the country specified in your purchase settings or company registration. Disputes are resolved as prescribed.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: For terms of use inquiries, contact our support.

faq.answer: KIKO is a family AI companion with voice interface, projector, and camera. It helps with games, children's education, video calls, and family activities – safely and fun.

faq.question: Which devices does KIKO support?
faq.answer: KIKO is an autonomous device with a projector and camera, and supports a mobile app on iOS and Android for control and personalization.

faq.question: Which languages are supported?
faq.answer: KIKO supports Russian and other major languages. The list of languages is regularly expanded.

faq.question: Is KIKO usage paid?
faq.answer: Basic KIKO functionality is available without subscription. Additional premium content, educational courses, and some games may require subscription or separate purchase.

faq.question: How to get technical support?
faq.answer: Tech support is available via the app, website's 'Support' section, and email support@kiko.ai. For emergencies, use built-in problem reporting tools.

general.question: What is KIKO?
general.answer: KIKO is a home social robot with a projector, camera, and voice AI that creates interactive projections, engages in dialogue, assists with learning, and organizes family games.

general.question: How to download and connect KIKO?
general.answer: Download the KIKO app, create a family profile, and follow Wi-Fi connection instructions. A detailed guide is in the 'User Guide' section.

general.question: Which languages does KIKO support?
general.answer: KIKO supports Russian and several other languages; the list expands with software updates.

general.question: Is KIKO usage paid?
general.answer: Core functionality is free. Premium content, educational courses, and additional packages may be paid.

general.question: How to get support?
general.answer: Support is available via the app, website, and email support@kiko.ai.

security.question: How secure is KIKO?
security.answer: KIKO prioritizes security: local sensitive information processing, encryption, and parental controls – all for family peace of mind.

security.question: What if I forgot my password?
security.answer: Use recovery via your linked email or phone in the app. For additional measures, contact support.

security.question: How to enable two-factor authentication?
security.answer: Go to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication and follow the instructions.

security.question: How to transfer KIKO to another device?
security.answer: Add a new profile in the app and use the transfer wizard for settings and family profiles.

security.question: Where to report fraud?
security.answer: Report any suspicious requests or phishing attempts to security@kiko.ai.

payment.question: How are content prices determined?
payment.answer: Prices depend on content type: paid courses, scene packs, or subscriptions. All terms are displayed before purchase.

payment.question: Which payment methods are supported?
payment.answer: Card payment, mobile payments, and local payment methods – depending on region.

payment.question: What are the purchase limits?
payment.answer: Parental profiles can set daily and single purchase limits in the app.

payment.question: Can I cancel an order?
payment.answer: Cancellation is possible within a set period if content hasn't been activated. Refund policy is available in the purchase section.

payment.question: How long does a withdrawal/refund take?
payment.answer: Refunds are processed according to payment provider terms, usually within 5–10 business days.

crypto.question: Which content formats are supported?
crypto.answer: KIKO supports interactive scenarios, videos, audio, animations, and expandable game modules.

crypto.question: How does learning and tutoring work?
crypto.answer: KIKO uses adaptive algorithms to adjust to a child's level, explain tasks, and show explanatory projections and videos.

crypto.question: How to manage NFT/digital media?
crypto.answer: Currently, KIKO supports managing and playing digital collections within the profile; advanced features are under development.

crypto.question: How to connect to Web3 applications?
crypto.answer: Integrations with external platforms are implemented via secure APIs and with explicit user consent.

account_creation.subtitle: Account Creation
account_creation.content:
1. Download KIKO app
2. Tap 'Create Family' and add family profiles
3. Connect device to Wi-Fi
4. Set up parental control and PIN
5. Complete a short tutorial scenario

security_settings.subtitle: Security Settings
security_settings.content:
1. Enable encrypted backups
2. Activate two-factor authentication
3. Set age restrictions for child profiles

view_assets.subtitle: View Content
view_assets.content: On the home screen, you'll see active games, lessons, and recent projections. Tap a card for details.

send_crypto.subtitle: Send Content
send_crypto.content:
1. Open 'Exchange' section
2. Select scenario or game
3. Specify recipient (profile) and access rights
4. Confirm transfer

receive_crypto.subtitle: Receive Content
receive_crypto.content:
1. Go to 'Inbox'
2. Accept or decline sent content
3. Review access rights and terms of use

token_swap.subtitle: Skill Exchange

2. Upload KIKO skill package
3. Publish or share with community
